rules.ruleString: (Must be enrolled in course type {03, 04, 05, 06, 06PG, 09, 09-1, 09-4} and Must be enrolled in course version {3169, 3845})
Must be enrolled in course version {3169, 3845, 4414}

description: Under the guidance of an academic supervisor, this subject allows a student to independently gain in-depth discipline knowledge in a selected area of business and commerce as a foundation to the completion of an honours project. The student will complete a prescribed list of readings, undertake further independent literature studies, and complete other learning activities and assessments considered appropriate for the selected field of study.
